name: Sale of fee by lessor
text:
No fee owner of any residential lot under lease shall sell the leased fee interest to the lot to any third party unless the fee owner has first given a written thirty-day notice to the lessee and the corporation of such intention. [L 1967, c 307, §42; HRS ; gen ch 1985; am L 1987, c 337, §16; am L 1988, c 104, §2]
    [Section effective July 1, 2006.  For section effective until June 30, 2006, see above.]  No fee owner of any residential lot under lease shall sell the leased fee interest to the lot to any third party unless the fee owner has first given a written thirty-day notice to the lessee and the administration of such intention. [L 1967, c 307, §42; HRS ; gen ch 1985; am L 1987, c 337, §16; am L 1988, c 104, §2; am L 2005, c 196, §26(b)]
